storyInfo: Meteor never imagined that the girl she had to take care of would teach her how to face her past when, one day, those painful memories come flooding back.

attributes.content: 11:00 P.M. \ Heavy Rain
Meteor's Dorm Room
Why is it raining so heavily? I'm freezing. Guess I'll turn on the heater.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Hm... How do I adjust the temperature? Do I turn this little round thing... but which way...?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Maybe this will do it? Eh, I really can't wrap my head around these gadgets. I wish we had a fireplace.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Phew, look at the time. I wonder when Mina gets off work. The Medic operators really have it hard. We're roommates, but we almost never see each other.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Meteor, it's me. Sorry to call this late.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Mina? I thought you were working overtime? What's the matter? Did you forget something?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: It's Gianna. She's crying her eyes out, and asking for you. None of us can calm her down.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Gianna?! What's the matter? Is she alright? Hang on. I'll get changed and come to Medical right away!
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: No, no, you got it wrong, Meteor! She's scared of thunder! Oh, slow down. I'll take her there, okay?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: O-Okay, Mina. Let me talk to her first.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: No problem. Gianna? Meteor wants to talk to you. Here you go.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Meteor, I'm scared! *Sobs*, where are you?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Gianna, don't worry. I'll wait for you here. I'll make you some of that snowy rice milk you like.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: There, there, Gianna. Don't cry. We'll go to Meteor's right now.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: *Whimpers*... I-I'll be strong, Mina... I'll stop crying.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: It's okay. We'll be there soon.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Mina, it's very cold over here. Did you give her a few more layers of clothes?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Of course. Medical has sweaters just for children. It'll keep her warm and comfy.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Make sure she's wearing socks and everything.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Of course, of course. Okay, Meteor, I need to carry Gianna, so I'm gonna hang up now. I'll see you in a moment.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Okay, I'll wait for you here. See you.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: How am I supposed to stop worrying when all she ever does is cry?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: I guess I'll turn up the heat. We need to keep her warm.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: A month ago
Medical Department
Meteor, could you please take care of this girl for the time being? Please!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: We found her in the ruins. Her family died shielding her when the ceiling fell, and now... Well... she's the only one left.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Well, I definitely don't mind doing that. It's just... why are you coming to me for this? Aren't there professionals in Medical who are better at babysitting?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Medical has actually been pretty overworked lately. I'm ashamed to say this, but we don't have enough manpower, so you're the only one I can turn to.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Oh, right, one second.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: What's this...?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: This is her evaluation. The psychologists at Medical are recommending that we have someone stay with her at all times, but I don't have the time myself. *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Oh, really? Alright, I'll stay with her when you're busy. Thankfully, I don't really have much going on lately.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Thanks, Meteor. She's still a kid. It's not easy for someone her age to accept her family's gone... I'm sure she'll get back on her feet quickly with you by her side.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Is that a compliment? Well, thanks. So where is this girl? Can I meet her?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Of course. Come with me. She's in the ward over here.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: This is the girl?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Hey, Gianna? Have you been a good girl and taken your medicine? I brought a new friend with me today.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I've been a good girl today, Mina... Who is that behind you...?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Who are you, lady?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Gianna, this is Meteor. She'll be helping me take care of you from here on out. You don't need to be scared. She's patient and kind. You'll like her.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Mina... *Sobs*... I... I'll be okay. I know you're busy. I'll be a good girl. You don't have to worry.
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: *Sigh*, Gianna, you're such a sensible girl, it really tugs at my heartstrings.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Meteor, I still have other things to take care of, so I'm going. I'll leave her to you; I'll be back as soon as I'm done.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: See you later, Mina.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Um, Miss... N-Nice to meet you. My name is Gianna, and I'm six!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Uh, little girl, I...
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: I... I've been taking my medicine, and I'm not picky about food. I-I even learned how to fold roses. Do you like roses? I... I'll give you all of them.
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Phew—Ahem, Gianna, is it? Hello, I'm Meteor. You don't have to call me 'Miss' or anything; just Meteor will do.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Meteor...?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: I know that... you come looking for Mina a lot... I've seen you before. You talk so gentle... I...
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: If you want to, you can think of me as a big sister. I've always wanted a little sister.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: I... May I really?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: *Whimpers*...
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Meteor, I... *Sobs*...
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: What's the matter? It's okay. Tell your big sister everything.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: I-I can't find my doll!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Ah, I see. Have you talked to Mina about it? Did she help you look?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: She's very busy... I can't... can't bother her.
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: That's okay. How about I go look for it, then?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: I don't want to look for it anymore. Don't. Don't go, Meteor. Please... Please don't leave me alone.
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: I won't go anywhere. It's okay. How about I buy you a new one, then?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: *Sobs*... I don't want a new doll! I just want a big sister... S-Stay here with me, Meteor. I don't want to be alone.
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Don't worry. I'm not going anywhere. I'm here.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: *Sobs*—
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: I'm here. I'm here. Don't worry. You don't need to be scared anymore.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: How come Gianna isn't even wearing socks? Mina, why is she completely barefoot?!
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: It's not my fault! She said she wanted to come look for you, and she ran out the door after she put on a sweater! I couldn't catch her!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: *Whimpers*, Meteor, I'm scared! That boom is too loud! I'm too scared to sleep!
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: You mean the thunder? Bad, bad thunder. We'll go to the Doctor tomorrow and file a complaint.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Okay, *sobs*...
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Okay now, you two come inside.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: I'll pass. Here's her toothbrush. Make sure she brushes her teeth after she's done with her milk, and here's her towel, her socks, her hand puppet, and her feather hairpin.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Okay, I got it. Look at you. You're like her mom.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Eh? Now that you mention it, I guess I'm kinda like one. Hm, okay. Gianna? Mommy still has work to do. Be a good girl here, okay?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Come, Gianna, say bye bye to Mina.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: *Sobs*... Bye, Mila.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: It's Mina, not Mila! Oh, well. I gotta go back. Good night, Meteor.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Good night. I'll see you tomorrow.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: *Whimpers*, s-see you tomorrow.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Gianna, you're covered in snot. Don't get my pajamas all dirty, okay?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: I won't... *Sniffs*.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: You know, I can get you some tissues.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Oh, Meteor, it's coming out again!!
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Ahh! Where are the tissues? Right here! Here you go, wipe yourself clean!
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Okay now let's tuck you into bed. Be sure to get your feet in too.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Your blanket is so warm, Meteor, and it smells like roses.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: *Chuckles*, don't be silly.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Come here, Meteor.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: You want a hug?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Yup!
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: You want me to tell you a story too?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Yup!
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Be sure to go to bed after the story, okay? You won't be scared of the thunder anymore, right?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Meteor... Actually, I'm scared because... the same thing happened that day too. Daddy, Mommy, and my big sister all got colder and colder... That's why I'm scared.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: I see... You're scared of the thunder because of what happened...?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: *Sobs*... I wanna be as strong as you, but I'm not...
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: It's okay. I get scared because of things that happened in the past too, Gianna.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Really? But you always look like you're not scared of anything. How do you do that?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Well, first I think of the things that I'm scared of as big, scary monsters. Then I imagine myself a brave hunter.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: What do you do after that?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Well, this is where I tell you a little story.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: A story? What kind?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Once upon a time, in a big forest in faraway Kazimierz, there was a thick pile of leaves on the ground.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Was there something in the pile?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: A little hunter, shivering...
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Just like me? I'm shaking in your bed.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: You're shaking? Hm, you're right. Your feet are so cold.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Come closer. I'll hold you.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Is it still cold?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Let's keep going, then.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Our poor little hunter had left home, and she was lost in the forest, all alone. The chilly wind was seeping through her thin clothes, and her hair was completely drenched by the cold rain.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: The sounds of the thunder in the skies high up above were just as loud as the howls of her hungry tummy.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: That sounds so scary.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: No, what's even scarier is that there was a huge, crafty wild beast following the hunter's weak scent, tracking her down.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: It buried its nose in the wet mud and rubbed itself against the coarse tree barks. The bushes, the swamps, the streams. It wasn't going to leave any corner untouched.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Finally, under a dead tree, it finally found it... It found... a foot—!
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Ahh! Meteor, you meanie! Let go of my leg!
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Yep, looks like your feet aren't so cold anymore.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Hmph, I'm putting my feet on your tummy.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Sure thing. Hm, where were we again?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: The beast found her, and it was going to catch her.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Oh, right. The little hunter was so scared that she was hiding in a pile of leaves. She could already hear the beast's breath and the sounds of its hooves trudging through the mud.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Huff—Huff—
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: *Thump*—
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: The little hunter was too scared to even breathe. Tears dripped down her face one after another.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: The beast had been hunting the hunter day after day, night after night. She managed to get away so many times, but our poor little hunter wasn't going to get away this time.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Don't give up, hunter!
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Right, she can't give up! As soon as the beast bore its fangs, the hunter forced herself to calm down and asked, 'Do I really have my back to the wall?'
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: She held her breath and took out the very last arrow in her quiver. She finally found the courage to take on the beast, looking straight at it through the gaps in the pile of leaves.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Why wasn't she scared anymore?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: She remembered a song that her grandpa used to sing for her.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: What kind of a song is that? Can you sing it for me, Meteor?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: When the little hunter was still a tiny little baby hunter, her grandpa always sang this while he held her: '♪My baby girl, should you find yourself chased through the woods by a beast most vile, under the calm, gentle moon in the sky♪'
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: '♪Never forget, walk forth in big strides. If there is no way to go, turn around not with fright. With your bow and arrow you must fight, and the beast you must smite♪'
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: At that moment, the moonlight lit the way, and the earth helped her lift her shoulders. The little hunter released her bowstring, and the roaring breeze sent her arrow straight into the beast's chest, felling it.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Meteor, did the beast die?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Yes, it did. With that tiny bit of determination and courage, the little hunter defeated the frightening beast in the most decisive moment. And me, that's also how I overcame my past, the past that I used to be scared of.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: And as long as you can muster up the courage, Gianna, you can overcome anything that—
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: But, Meteor, I-I don't want to defeat my past! When I'm scared, it's not just the bad things that I remember. I remember all the happy memories I had with everyone too!
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Doesn't thinking about them make your heart ache, though?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Yup... it does, and it makes me cry, but it warms up my heart too. When I didn't have you, it was the memories that helped me through everything.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Hmm... really? Looks like... Looks like your little beast doesn't actually want to eat you. Haha.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: I don't think the beast in your story wanted to eat the hunter either.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Hm? What makes you think that?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: How does the hunter know the beast wants to eat her? She didn't ask the beast, and she's only ever run away. She never tried to talk to the beast.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Well, the beast has been chasing the hunter. What else could it be after, if not eating her?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: No, Meteor. You said the hunter was scared, cold, and hungry. You never said she was hurt because the beast chased her.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Maybe it thinks the lonely girl needs a friend to help her out of that place.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Please, Meteor. Please don't kill it.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Meteor? W-What's the matter? Why are you so quiet?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Did I say something wrong?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: No, you reminded me of something, in the past.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Is it a memory that makes your chest burn?
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Yep, it always makes me feel down in the dumps whenever I think about it. That's why I try my best to keep myself from remembering it.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: You can't do that, Meteor.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Yeah, you're right. The hunter was wrong, and I was too. I shouldn't have killed it, and I shouldn't have sealed the memory away.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: All those nights I spent in the wastes, away from my family. The pain, the joy, the sorrow, and the boredom... It was there every moment, and it wasn't there to kill me.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: (I kind of know what Meteor's saying... but also kind of don't.)
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Gianna, I... I just came up with a new ending. Wanna hear it?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Okay, then. Lie down and get in bed.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: I lied down! My eyes are shut, too! Tell me the story!
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: At the very end, the little hunter took her dagger out, but she didn't use it to stab the beast's heart.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Instead, she cut off a piece of her clothes and bandaged the beast's wound.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: She petted the beast's fluffy head and then asked, 'Can you move, buddy?'
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: The beast pondered a little in silence and then stood up.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Then, she asked the beast, 'I'm going on an adventure. I don't know what lies ahead, but I know I'll need a buddy. Do you want to come?'
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: The beast didn't stay quiet this time. It neighed happily, and it started to sway its tail from side to side, like a whip.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: It ran really fast, and when she rode on its back, it was just like the hunter could grasp the wind.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: She wasn't lonely any more. Together, they ran off toward the sunlight.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Zzz—Meteor... I'm tired.
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Zzzz—
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Are you asleep?
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Zzzzz...
attributes.name: Gianna

attributes.content: Mina's such a dummy.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: She thinks you aren't strong enough, but you figured out how to confront those things a long time ago.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: (Kisses) But thanks, Gianna.
attributes.name: Meteor

attributes.content: Thanks...
attributes.name: Meteor
